resources.string: Use at your own risk. I have put a lot of work into this app, but there is still a potiential to break stuff.
This will probably void your waranty, and you will need to be rooted.
This will restore you to LGs STOCK recovery
THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS AND NOT WORKING YET
THIS AWILL FORMAT YOUR SDCARD. ONLY PROCEED IF YOU ARE READY FOR THAT
This will try to root your f6. It may or may not work. If it doesn\'t, just use saferoot from a pc.
I detected that your SD Card is already formatted or that Links2SD is already in place. This hack is not compatible with that. Factory Reset and delete any other partitions.

This is still a work in progress and a very dirty hack. Don\'t hit apply if you can\'t figure out how to restore. It works by setting the second partition on your SD Card as the actual data partition. If your sdcard is formatted improperly this will result in a bootloop.

App developer(s): Pressy4pie, PlayfulGod.

 CWM ported by: Pressy4pie.

 SDCardHack implemented by: PressY4pie.

 Root method by: k1mu.

 Special Thanks to: the #oudhitsquad. 

 Extra Special Thanks: requisite0 

 (What a jackass)
